mapper.update: update book set visit_count = visit_count + ${visitCount} where id = #{bookId}
mapper.select: select id,pic_url,book_name,book_desc from book where cat_id = #{catId} order by RAND() LIMIT 4
mapper.update: update book set comment_count = comment_count+1 where id = #{bookId}
mapper.select: select id,pic_url from book where pic_url like 'http%' and pic_url not like concat('%',#{localPicPrefix},'%') limit #{limit}
select id,book_name,author_name,pic_url,book_desc,score from book ORDER BY score,RAND() LIMIT #{limit};
